H0.text: Hydrogen is the element that combines with oxygen to form water.

H1.text: Glucose is the compound combined with oxygen to form water.

H2.text: Helium is the element that oxygen is combined with to form water.

H3.text: Carbon is the element combined with oxygen to form water.

A4.text: Hydrogen gas is highly flammable, reacting with oxygen in air to produce liquid water:
